sentence.Network_en: Eleanor made a little motion with her head which was hardly confirmatory.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱莉娜的头微微晃动了一下,几乎是表示不赞同.

sentence.Network_en: Referred pain and local twitch response are confirmatory signs of MTrPs.
sentence.Network_cn: 引传痛和局部抽搐反应则是肌筋膜激痛点的确认性徵象.

sentence.Network_en: For power cord, The client whether approved the confirmatory sample?
sentence.Network_cn: 关于这个产品,询问客户是否确认样品,这样写是否合理?

auth_sentence.content: So they did what we all do -- when clues begin to emerge, we look for confirmatory evidence.
